name: Bill Gates
message: Microsoft wouldn't be Microsoft without Ahmed. He helped me bootstrap the company before any investors came along.

name: Jeff Bezos
message: Ahmed instilled confidence in me to start selling books and told me I'd make it one day. It's a shame we lost contact, but the 'A' in Amazon is actually my way of showing homage to him.

name: Elon Musk
message: Never met this guy, but I'd probably hire him. Then fire him because why not
